definition: to offer/to present/to dedicate/to donate/to show/to put on display/worthy person (old)

sentences.english: Everyone has to try to contribute $10 from money that we have earned ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 每個人都必須努力從自己掙到的錢裏拿出十美元捐獻。

sentences.english: This means we need a constant flow of blood from donation to storage.
sentences.chinese: 這就意味着需要經常性的從捐獻者那裏採血並儲存。

sentences.english: He contributed half of his savings to the relief fund.
sentences.chinese: 他將積蓄的一半捐獻給救濟基金會。

sentences.english: Others become involved as donors of backyard fruit.
sentences.chinese: 另一些參與者作爲自產水果捐獻者。

sentences.english: Therefore, we will make a contribution to The Rotary Foundation as our expression of thanks.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我們將對扶輪基金會捐獻，以聊表謝忱。

sentences.english: I am on the bone marrow register.
sentences.chinese: 我是個骨髓捐獻的在冊人員。

sentences.english: Donating millions to disaster relief is charity, give astranger a smile is also charity.
sentences.chinese: 捐獻幾百萬救災是慈善，給陌生人個微笑也是慈善。

sentences.english: Donate your leftover paint to a community project.
sentences.chinese: 把你沒有用完的油漆捐獻給社區項目。

sentences.english: Donate poetry books by contemporary poets to your library or school.
sentences.chinese: 當代詩人將自己的作品捐獻給圖書館或學校。

sentences.english: This could be particularly significant for children, for whom donor tracheas are much more difficult to find.
sentences.chinese: 對於難以尋找捐獻器官的兒童來說，意義更大。

sentences.english: I fast twice a week, I give tithes of all that I get.
sentences.chinese: 我每週兩次禁食，凡我所得的，都捐獻十分之一。

sentences.english: Yancey had been on the organ donation waiting list for two years.
sentences.chinese: 揚西已經在器官捐獻名單上等待了兩年。

sentences.english: Who are these generous milk donors?
sentences.chinese: 這些高尚的母乳捐獻者是誰？

sentences.english: Now if only Mr. Whipple were around to give away the bride.
sentences.chinese: 現在，只要惠普爾先生要捐獻這套禮服的話。

sentences.english: They donated 3,000,000 yuan to the people in the flooded area in the name of the PLA.
sentences.chinese: 他們以解放軍的名義給水災災區人民捐獻了3百萬元。

sentences.english: Owen would also like to thank this "unsung heroes" for their contribution.
sentences.chinese: 歐文也很感謝這兩位“無名英雄”的捐獻。

definition: service to the public/public welfare undertaking/charity/social facility
to repay a favor/to give back/feedback
